meanings.definition: To meet or come across someone or something unexpectedly.
meanings.sent1: Yesterday, I was rencountering my old friend at the grocery store.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy rencountering familiar faces in my neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: While rencountering my cat in the kitchen, I realized she had stolen my sandwich.
meanings.sent4: The hiker was rencountering breathtaking views at the mountain's summit.
meanings.sent5: The detective was rencountering clues that would solve the mystery.

meanings.definition: A meeting or encounter with someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The rencountering with my childhood hero left me speechless.
meanings.sent2: The unexpected rencountering with a lost friend brought back fond memories.
meanings.sent3: The rencountering of two rival gangs at the park led to an intense standoff.
meanings.sent4: The rencountering of the sun and moon in the sky painted a beautiful scene.
meanings.sent5: The rencountering of old traditions and modern values sparked a lively debate.
